info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 01 at 5:58PM PDT until August 01 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 900 PM PDT. * At 558 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Red Rock Canyon. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Red Rock Canyon, Blue Diamond, Summerlin, Enterprise, Spring Mountain Ranch, Rocky Gap Campground and Red Rock Canyon Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
